content:
Russian invaders continue to fire the border areas of Chernihiv and Sumy regions. In total, 74 shelling (311 explosions) from different types of weapons were charged during the day.

About thisinformsOperational Command "North".

Three communities of Chernihiv region were under enemy shelling.

Semeniv community:

  • Liskivshchyna - 8 explosions, probably barrel artillery; 2 shelling: 6 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • MHA - 4 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Karpovichi - 16 explosions, probably a mortar 82 mm.
  • Spinning - 5 explosions, probably RSZV.
  • Zarichia - 7 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Timonovichi - 3 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm; 2 shelling: 2 explosions, probably FPV-Dron.
  • Leonivka - 3 explosions, probably a mortar 82 mm.
  • Kostobok - 2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Baranivka - 2 shelling: 6 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Snovsk community:

  • Kuts - 7 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Mountain - 2 shelling: 8 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Hrinivka-1 explosion, probably FPV-Dron.

Novgorod-Siversky community:

  • Mikhalchyna Sloboda - 2 shelling: 8 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Gramyach - 5 explosions, probably become artillery.

Four districts of Sumy region fired the enemy for the past day.

Sumy District:

  • Turia - 1 explosion, probably reset the UAV; 2 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Veselivka - 3 explosions, probably a mortar 82 mm.
  • Basivka - 4 shelling: 21 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm; 5 shelling: 13 explosions, probably dropping the UAV.
  • Andreevka - 2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Kindrativka - 3 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm; 8 explosions, probably RSZV.
  • Krasnopillya - 9 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Pisarivka - 5 explosions, probably barrel artillery.
  • Yunakivka - 2 explosions, probably room. As a result of the shelling, a dwelling house was damaged.
  • Novodmitrivka - 1 explosion, probably discharge of UAV VP; 2 explosions, probably mortar 120 mm.
  • Tolphine - 2 explosions, probably RPG; 5 explosions, probably become artillery; 2 shelling: 33 explosions, probably AGS.
  • Novomykolaivka - 5 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Aquarius - 4 explosions, probably dropping the UAV.
  • Cover - 2 shelling: 2 explosions, probably dropping VP from UAV; 3 shelling: 5 explosions, probably dropping the UAV.
  • Teratutine - 2 shelling: 8 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm; 2 explosions, probably become artillery.

Okhtyr District:

  • Dmitrovka-1 explosion, probably FPV-Dron.
  • Popivka - 3 shelling: 3 explosions, probably discharge of UAV.
  • Lugovka - 2 explosions, probably mortar 120 mm.
  • Oleksandrivka - 2 explosions, probably mortar 120 mm; 2 shelling: 14 explosions, probably barrel artillery.

Konotop District:

  • Circle - 6 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Shostka district:

  • Kucherivka - 8 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Chamomile-1 explosion, probably FPV-Dron; 6 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Mid-building-5 explosions, probably become artillery.
  • Old - 4 shelling: 30 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Forty - 2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.
  • Old guta - 2 explosions, probably a mortar 120 mm.

Information on the destruction, dead or injured among the local population is specified.
